013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi.ui;
014
015import static java.util.Collections.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.HtmlBuilder.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.set;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.bean.html5.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
028
029/**
030 * Generates an OpenAPI-UI interface from an OpenAPI document.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
033 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
034 * </ul>
035 */
036public class OpenApiUI extends ObjectSwap<OpenApi,Div> {
037
038   static final FileFinder RESOURCES = FileFinder
039      .create(BeanStore.INSTANCE)
040      .cp(OpenApiUI.class, null, true)
041      .dir(",")
042      .caching(Boolean.getBoolean("RestContext.disableClasspathResourceCaching.b") ? -1 : 1_000_000)
043      .build();
044
045   private static final Set<String> STANDARD_METHODS = set("get", "put", "post", "delete", "options", "head", "patch", "trace");
046
047   /**
048    * This UI applies to HTML requests only.
049    */
050   @Override
051   public org.apache.juneau.MediaType[] forMediaTypes() {
052      return new org.apache.juneau.MediaType[] {org.apache.juneau.MediaType.HTML};
053   }
054
055   private static final class Session {
056      final int resolveRefsMaxDepth;
057      final OpenApi openApi;
058
059      Session(OpenApi openApi) {
060         this.openApi = openApi.copy();
061         this.resolveRefsMaxDepth = 1;
062      }
063   }
064
065   @Override
066   public Div swap(BeanSession beanSession, OpenApi openApi) throws Exception {
067
068      var s = new Session(openApi);
069
070      var css = RESOURCES.getString("files/htdocs/styles/OpenApiUI.css", null).orElse(null);
071      if (css == null)
072         css = RESOURCES.getString("OpenApiUI.css", null).orElse(null);
073
074      var outer = div(
075         style(css),
076         script("text/javascript", RESOURCES.getString("OpenApiUI.js", null).orElse(null)),
077         header(s)
078      )._class("openapi-ui");
079
080      // Operations without tags are rendered first.
081      outer.child(div()._class("tag-block tag-block-open").children(tagBlockContents(s, null)));
082
083      if (s.openApi.getTags() != null) {
084         s.openApi.getTags().forEach(x -> {
085            var tagBlock = div()._class("tag-block tag-block-open").children(
086               tagBlockSummary(x),
087               tagBlockContents(s, x)
088            );
089            outer.child(tagBlock);
090         });
091      }
092
093      if (s.openApi.getComponents() != null && s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas() != null) {
094         var modelBlock = div()._class("tag-block").children(
095            modelsBlockSummary(),
096            modelsBlockContents(s)
097         );
098         outer.child(modelBlock);
099      }
100
101      return outer;
102   }
103
104   // Creates the informational summary before the ops.
105   private Table header(Session s) {
106      var table = table()._class("header");
107
108      var info = s.openApi.getInfo();
109      if (info != null) {
110
111         if (info.getDescription() != null)
112            table.child(tr(th("Description:"),td(toBRL(info.getDescription()))));
113
114         if (info.getVersion() != null)
115            table.child(tr(th("Version:"),td(info.getVersion())));
116
117         var c = info.getContact();
118         if (c != null) {
119            var t2 = table();
120
121            if (c.getName() != null)
122               t2.child(tr(th("Name:"),td(c.getName())));
123            if (c.getUrl() != null)
124               t2.child(tr(th("URL:"),td(a(c.getUrl(), c.getUrl()))));
125            if (c.getEmail() != null)
126               t2.child(tr(th("Email:"),td(a("mailto:"+ c.getEmail(), c.getEmail()))));
127
128            table.child(tr(th("Contact:"),td(t2)));
129         }
130
131         var l = info.getLicense();
132         if (l != null) {
133            var content = l.getName() != null ? l.getName() : l.getUrl();
134            var child = l.getUrl() != null ? a(l.getUrl(), content) : l.getName();
135            table.child(tr(th("License:"),td(child)));
136         }
137
138         ExternalDocumentation ed = s.openApi.getExternalDocs();
139         if (ed != null) {
140            var content = ed.getDescription() != null ? ed.getDescription() : ed.getUrl();
141            var child = ed.getUrl() != null ? a(ed.getUrl(), content) : ed.getDescription();
142            table.child(tr(th("Docs:"),td(child)));
143         }
144
145         if (info.getTermsOfService() != null) {
146            var tos = info.getTermsOfService();
147            var child = StringUtils.isUri(tos) ? a(tos, tos) : tos;
148            table.child(tr(th("Terms of Service:"),td(child)));
149         }
150      }
151
152      return table;
153   }
154
155   // Creates the "pet  Everything about your Pets  ext-link" header.
156   private HtmlElement tagBlockSummary(Tag t) {
157      var ed = t.getExternalDocs();
158
159      var content = ed != null && ed.getDescription() != null ? ed.getDescription() : (ed != null ? ed.getUrl() : null);
160      return div()._class("tag-block-summary").children(
161         span(t.getName())._class("name"),
162         span(toBRL(t.getDescription()))._class("description"),
163         ed != null && ed.getUrl() != null ? span(a(ed.getUrl(), content))._class("extdocs") : null
164      ).onclick("toggleTagBlock(this)");
165   }
166
167   // Creates the contents under the "pet  Everything about your Pets  ext-link" header.
168   private Div tagBlockContents(Session s, Tag t) {
169      var tagBlockContents = div()._class("tag-block-contents");
170
171      if (s.openApi.getPaths() != null) {
172         s.openApi.getPaths().forEach((path, pathItem) -> {
173            // Check each HTTP method in the path item
174            if (pathItem.getGet() != null)
175               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "get", pathItem.getGet(), t);
176            if (pathItem.getPut() != null)
177               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "put", pathItem.getPut(), t);
178            if (pathItem.getPost() != null)
179               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "post", pathItem.getPost(), t);
180            if (pathItem.getDelete() != null)
181               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "delete", pathItem.getDelete(), t);
182            if (pathItem.getOptions() != null)
183               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "options", pathItem.getOptions(), t);
184            if (pathItem.getHead() != null)
185               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "head", pathItem.getHead(), t);
186            if (pathItem.getPatch() != null)
187               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "patch", pathItem.getPatch(), t);
188            if (pathItem.getTrace() != null)
189               addOperationIfTagMatches(tagBlockContents, s, path, "trace", pathItem.getTrace(), t);
190         });
191      }
192
193      return tagBlockContents;
194   }
195
196   private void addOperationIfTagMatches(Div tagBlockContents, Session s, String path, String method, Operation op, Tag t) {
197      if ((t == null && (op.getTags() == null || op.getTags().isEmpty())) || 
198         (t != null && op.getTags() != null && op.getTags().contains(t.getName()))) {
199         tagBlockContents.child(opBlock(s, path, method, op));
200      }
201   }
202
203   private Div opBlock(Session s, String path, String opName, Operation op) {
204
205      var opClass = op.getDeprecated() != null && op.getDeprecated() ? "deprecated" : opName.toLowerCase();
206      if (!(op.getDeprecated() != null && op.getDeprecated()) && !STANDARD_METHODS.contains(opClass))
207         opClass = "other";
208
209      return div()._class("op-block op-block-closed " + opClass).children(
210         opBlockSummary(path, opName, op),
211         div(tableContainer(s, op))._class("op-block-contents")
212      );
213   }
214
215   private HtmlElement opBlockSummary(String path, String opName, Operation op) {
216      return div()._class("op-block-summary").children(
217         span(opName.toUpperCase())._class("method-button"),
218         span(path)._class("path"),
219         op.getSummary() != null ? span(op.getSummary())._class("summary") : null
220      ).onclick("toggleOpBlock(this)");
221   }
222
223   private Div tableContainer(Session s, Operation op) {
224      var tableContainer = div()._class("table-container");
225
226      if (op.getDescription() != null)
227         tableContainer.child(div(toBRL(op.getDescription()))._class("op-block-description"));
228
229      if (op.getParameters() != null) {
230         tableContainer.child(div(h4("Parameters")._class("title"))._class("op-block-section-header"));
231
232         var parameters = table(tr(th("Name")._class("parameter-key"), th("Description")._class("parameter-key")))._class("parameters");
233
234         op.getParameters().forEach(x -> {
235            var piName = x.getName();
236            var required = x.getRequired() != null && x.getRequired();
237
238            var parameterKey = td(
239               div(piName)._class("name" + (required ? " required" : "")),
240               required ? div("required")._class("requiredlabel") : null,
241               x.getSchema() != null ? div(x.getSchema().getType())._class("type") : null,
242               div('(' + x.getIn() + ')')._class("in")
243            )._class("parameter-key");
244
245            var parameterValue = td(
246               div(toBRL(x.getDescription()))._class("description"),
247               examples(s, x)
248            )._class("parameter-value");
249
250            parameters.child(tr(parameterKey, parameterValue));
251         });
252
253         tableContainer.child(parameters);
254      }
255
256      if (op.getResponses() != null) {
257         tableContainer.child(div(h4("Responses")._class("title"))._class("op-block-section-header"));
258
259         var responses = table(tr(th("Code")._class("response-key"), th("Description")._class("response-key")))._class("responses");
260         tableContainer.child(responses);
261
262         op.getResponses().forEach((k,v) -> {
263            var code = td(k)._class("response-key");
264
265            var codeValue = td(
266               div(toBRL(v.getDescription()))._class("description"),
267               examples(s, v),
268               headers(v)
269            )._class("response-value");
270
271            responses.child(tr(code, codeValue));
272         });
273      }
274
275      return tableContainer;
276   }
277
278   private Div headers(Response ri) {
279      if (ri.getHeaders() == null)
280         return null;
281
282      var sectionTable = table(tr(th("Name"),th("Description"),th("Schema")))._class("section-table");
283
284      var headers = div(
285         div("Headers:")._class("section-name"),
286         sectionTable
287      )._class("headers");
288
289      ri.getHeaders().forEach((k,v) ->
290         sectionTable.child(
291            tr(
292               td(k)._class("name"),
293               td(toBRL(v.getDescription()))._class("description"),
294               td(v.asMap().keepAll("type","format","items","collectionFormat","default","maximum","exclusiveMaximum","minimum","exclusiveMinimum","maxLength","minLength","pattern","maxItems","minItems","uniqueItems","enum","multipleOf"))
295            )
296         )
297      );
298
299      return headers;
300   }
301
302   private Div examples(Session s, Parameter pi) {
303      var m = new JsonMap();
304
305      try {
306         var si = pi.getSchema();
307         if (si != null)
308            m.put("model", si.copy().resolveRefs(s.openApi, new ArrayDeque<>(), s.resolveRefsMaxDepth));
309      } catch (Exception e) {
310         e.printStackTrace();
311      }
312
313      if (m.isEmpty())
314         return null;
315
316      return examplesDiv(m);
317   }
318
319   private Div examples(Session s, Response ri) {
320      var m = new JsonMap();
321      try {
322         var content = ri.getContent();
323         if (content != null) {
324            // For OpenAPI 3.0, content is a map of media types to MediaType objects
325            content.forEach((mediaType, mediaTypeObj) -> {
326               if (mediaTypeObj.getSchema() != null) {
327                  try {
328                     var schema = mediaTypeObj.getSchema().copy().resolveRefs(s.openApi, new ArrayDeque<>(), s.resolveRefsMaxDepth);
329                     m.put(mediaType, schema);
330                  } catch (Exception e) {
331                     e.printStackTrace();
332                  }
333               }
334            });
335         }
336      } catch (Exception e) {
337         e.printStackTrace();
338      }
339
340      if (m.isEmpty())
341         return null;
342
343      return examplesDiv(m);
344   }
345
346   private Div examplesDiv(JsonMap m) {
347      if (m.isEmpty())
348         return null;
349
350      Select select = null;
351      if (m.size() > 1) {
352         select = select().onchange("selectExample(this)")._class("example-select");
353      }
354
355      var div = div(select)._class("examples");
356
357      if (select != null)
358         select.child(option("model","model"));
359      div.child(div(m.remove("model"))._class("model active").attr("data-name", "model"));
360
361      var select2 = select;
362      m.forEach((k,v) -> {
363         if (select2 != null)
364            select2.child(option(k, k));
365         div.child(div(v.toString().replace("\\n", "\n"))._class("example").attr("data-name", k));
366      });
367
368      return div;
369   }
370
371   // Creates the "Model" header.
372   private HtmlElement modelsBlockSummary() {
373      return div()._class("tag-block-summary").children(span("Models")._class("name")).onclick("toggleTagBlock(this)");
374   }
375
376   // Creates the contents under the "Model" header.
377   private Div modelsBlockContents(Session s) {
378      var modelBlockContents = div()._class("tag-block-contents");
379      if (s.openApi.getComponents() != null && s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas() != null) {
380         s.openApi.getComponents().getSchemas().forEach((k,v) -> modelBlockContents.child(modelBlock(k,v)));
381      }
382      return modelBlockContents;
383   }
384
385   private Div modelBlock(String modelName, SchemaInfo model) {
386      return div()._class("op-block op-block-closed model").children(
387         modelBlockSummary(modelName, model),
388         div(model)._class("op-block-contents")
389      );
390   }
391
392   private HtmlElement modelBlockSummary(String modelName, SchemaInfo model) {
393      return div()._class("op-block-summary").children(
394         span(modelName)._class("method-button"),
395         model.getDescription() != null ? span(toBRL(model.getDescription()))._class("summary") : null
396      ).onclick("toggleOpBlock(this)");
397   }
398
399   /**
400    * Replaces newlines with <br> elements.
401    */
402   private static List<Object> toBRL(String s) {
403      if (s == null)
404         return null;  // NOSONAR - Intentionally returning null.
405      if (s.indexOf(',') == -1)
406         return singletonList(s);
407      var l = Utils.list();
408      var sa = s.split("\n");
409      for (var i = 0; i < sa.length; i++) {
410         if (i > 0)
411            l.add(br());
412         l.add(sa[i]);
413      }
414      return l;
415   }
416}
